verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With adoring heart, we render Honor to Thy precious name, Overflowing with Thy mercies, Far and wide Thy worth proclaim.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise Him! praise Him! praise the Savior! Saints, aloud your voices raise, Praise Him! praise Him! till in glory Perfected we’ll sing His praise.{/lang-eng}
